verses.verse: The <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the <S%H6723>desert<s%> will be <S%H1523>glad,<s%> And the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and <S%H6524>blossom;<s%> Like the <S%H2261>crocus<s%>

It will <S%H6524>blossom<s%> <S%H6524>profusely<s%> And <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> with <S%H1525>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%> of <S%H7442>joy.<s%> The <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> to it, The <S%H1926>majesty<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H8289>Sharon.<s%> They will <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H1926>majesty<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> to those with <S%H4116>anxious<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H2388>"Take<s%> <S%H2388>courage,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> not. <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> [with] <S%H5359>vengeance;<s%> The <S%H1576>recompense<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> But He will <S%H3467>save<s%> you."
<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> will be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> And the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> will be <S%H6605>unstopped.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> will <S%H1801>leap<s%> like a <S%H354>deer,<s%> And the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H483>dumb<s%> will <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy.<s%> For <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H1234>break<s%> <S%H1234>forth<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> And <S%H5158>streams<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah.<s%>

And the <S%H8273>scorched<s%> <S%H8273>land<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H98>pool,<s%> And the <S%H6774>thirsty<s%> <S%H6774>ground<s%> <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> In the <S%H5116>haunt<s%> of <S%H8565>jackals,<s%> its <S%H7258>resting<s%> <S%H7258>place,<s%> <S%H2682>Grass<s%> [becomes] <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H1573>rushes.<s%>

And a <S%H4547>highway<s%> will be <S%H8033>there,<s%> a <S%H1870>roadway,<s%> And it will be <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1870>Highway<s%> of <S%H6944>Holiness.<s%> The <S%H2931>unclean<s%> will not <S%H5674>travel<s%> on it, But it [will] be for him who <S%H1980>walks<s%> [that] <S%H1870>way,<s%> And <S%H191>fools<s%> will not <S%H8582>wander<s%> [on it].

<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H9030>lion<s%> will be <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H1077>Nor<s%> will any <S%H6530>vicious<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up on it; These will not be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> But the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> will <S%H1980>walk<s%> [there],

And the <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7725>return,<s%> And <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>shouting<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> With <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads.<s%> They will <S%H5381>find<s%> <S%H8342>gladness<s%> and <S%H8057>joy,<s%> And <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5127>away.<s%>
